widgetframe

Reference version 0.2.0

Package Description

widgetframe

widgetframe: A package for wrapping htmlwidgets in responsive iframes.

Functions for framable widgets

Allows easy embedding of htmlwidgets in CMSes such as Drupal/Wordpress etc.

frameableWidget

Adds pymjs initialization code to a htmlwidget.

saveWidgetframe

Save a widgetframe and its child widget to HTML files.

Functions for framing widgets

Renders htmlwidgets in responsive iframes in Rmarkdown documents.

frameWidget

A widget that wraps another widget inside a responsive iframe.

frameOptions

Options for widget's iframe.
